channel.title: CVE Feed for WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin -- Timeline and History slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin -- Timeline and History slider

item.title: CVE-2024-43232|2024-08-21T14:36:43.941Z -- wp%20onlinesupport%2C%20essential%20plugin -- timeline%20and%20history%20slider
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin Timeline and History slider allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Timeline and History slider: from n/a through 2.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-43232|2024-08-19T17:02:06.510Z -- wp%20onlinesupport%2C%20essential%20plugin -- timeline%20and%20history%20slider
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin Timeline and History slider allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Timeline and History slider: from n/a through 2.3.
